title: Visual Prison
overview: Ange Yuki, a boy who wrestles with deep-seated loneliness and can't fit in... With nobody to call family, he leaves his hometown. Longing to see an artist he admires perform, he heads for Harajuku, where he encounters a live battle between visual kei units ECLIPSE and LOS â€  EDEN. Overwhelmed by the energetic performance, he is suddenly struck by an intense pain...
